targets.expr:
# Percentage of total cluster GPUs requested by running pods
sum(
    kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
    * on(pod, namespace) 
    group_left() 
    (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"} == 1)
) / sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"})

# Percentage of total cluster GPUs requested by running pods
sum(
    kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
    * on(pod, namespace) 
    group_left() 
    (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"} == 1)
) / sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"})

100 - avg by(nodename) (
  rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[1m])
  * on(instance) 
  group_left(nodename) 
  node_uname_info
) * 100

avg by(nodename) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user"}[1m]) 
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info) * 100

avg by(nodename) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="system"}[1m]) 
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info) * 100

avg by(nodename) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="iowait"}[1m]) 
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info) * 100
avg by(Hostname) (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL)
